definition: to force (sb to do sth)/to compel/to press for/to extort/to press on towards/to press up to/to close in on/euphemistic variant of 屄[bi1]
to obtain confessions by compulsion/confession under duress
water-boarding, interrogation technique used by CIA

sentences.english: Extracting a confession by torture infringes the personal rights of citizens with malice.
sentences.chinese: 刑讯逼供是一种恶意侵犯公民人身权利的违法行为。

sentences.english: The confession was not admitted in court, because the accused claimed it had been extorted.
sentences.chinese: 因为被告声称逼供，故供认未被法庭采信。

sentences.english: Extraction of confession by torture has been one of the persistent ailments in legal affairs.
sentences.chinese: 刑讯逼供一直以来是司法实务中的顽症之一。

sentences.english: The Criminal Law lays down a special provision on the crime of extorting confessions by torture by judicial functionaries.
sentences.chinese: 《刑法》对于司法人员的刑讯逼供罪也专门作了规定。

sentences.english: The man, She Xianglin, said he had confessed to the crime under police torture.
sentences.chinese: 佘祥林曾说他屈服于警方的刑讯逼供。

sentences.english: Inquisition by torture is hated but fails to be prohibited.
sentences.chinese: 刑讯逼供深为人恶，但屡禁不止。

sentences.english: They extorted a confession from him by torture.
sentences.chinese: 他们对他进行刑讯逼供。

sentences.english: Cheney was unapologetic about the harsh interrogation methods that he had approved, such as waterboarding.
sentences.chinese: 切尼对自己支持的诸如水刑的严刑逼供并未有悔意。

sentences.english: Many of the prisoners have been tortured.
sentences.chinese: 许多囚犯都被刑讯逼供过。

sentences.english: The confession was made under torture.
sentences.chinese: 这份供词是严刑逼供得来的。

sentences.english: Abolishing this cruel punishment still has a long way to go.
sentences.chinese: 彻底废除刑讯逼供制度，还需要一个漫长的过程。

definition: to extort a confession/Taiwan pr. [po4 gong1]
to beat a prisoner (to obtain confessions)/to give sb the third degree/to torture
to question intensely/to interrogate/to demand information
strict law/cruel punishment/to carry out cruel law rigorously
oral confession (as opposed to 筆供|笔供[bi3 gong4])/statement/deposition
